Sentencas: Autothermal reformation of military jet fuel (1096 ppmw sulfur) was investigated with rhodium supported on thermally stabilized Y zeolite catalysts.
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: The zeolite catalysts were thermally stabilized by ion exchanging with nitrate solutions of rare-earth metals (La, Ce, Sm, Gd, Dy and Er).
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: Surface area analyses indicated that the exchanged zeolite could maintain its porous structure as high as 950 degrees C instead of 800 degrees C for a commercial NaY zeolite.
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: The structure of the exchanged zeolite was characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: Rh-SmNaY zeolite reforming catalysts were prepared by incipient wetness and organometallic synthesis.
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: The JP8 reforming experiments were performed in a short contact time adiabatic reactor with a monolithic catalyst with the addition of air and steam at a temperature below 920 degrees C.
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: The effects of steam and fuel-to-air ratio (C/O ratio) were studied.
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: Hydrogen and carbon monoxide were produced as the main products.
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: Durability tests were performed with Rh/SmNaY-zeolite catalysts.
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels

Sentencas: This work shows that zeolite based catalysts can convert transportation fuels such as high sulfur jet fuel (over 1000 ppmw S) to syngas for solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels
Rhodium supported on thermally enhanced zeolite as catalysts for fuel reformation of jet fuels
